testcase.name: Intialize browser,login to the application
testcase.system-out: Given Login to the application using username and password..................passed When validate if the title is "Giift LBMS"..................................passed Then click on the profile section...........................................passed Then select the program "AMS Partner Master"................................passed

testcase.name: Create the promotional template with both email and SMS channels
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to communications module...............................passed When user clicks on the Create Template button..............................passed And user enters the template name as "promotional" and template type as "promotional".passed And user setup the Email and user enter the email subject as "promotional subject" uplaod the title image and enter the email title as "promotional title" email body as "campaign bonus" button text as "Visit again" and button link is "www.abc.com".passed And clicks on the "Save" button.............................................passed And user setup the SMS and user enter the SMS Template ID as "promotional subject" and SMS body as "campaign bonus".passed And click on "Create template" button.......................................passed
